output_list.code: function buyFromRC(address _buyer, uint256 _rcTokenValue, uint256 _remainingTokens) onlyRC isBuyable public payable returns(uint256) {...}
output_list.reason: The function `buyFromRC` does not check the return value of the `tokenContract.transfer` function. If the transfer fails, the function will not revert and the remaining tokens will be lost. This can be exploited by an attacker who can send a malicious token contract that always fails the transfer. The attacker can then call `buyFromRC` and receive the remaining tokens without any compensation.
